statements: UPDATE in_game_store SET item_price = 10.99 WHERE purchase_id = 'f67292b4-6cbf-4bd5-9890-93ae07973042';
UPDATE in_game_store SET currency = 'EUR', player_id = '826a9b1c-5c38-4fa1-b3b4-248f4585cc20' WHERE item_name = 'Health Potion';
UPDATE in_game_store SET item_price = 10.99, currency = 'USD' WHERE purchase_id = '5e546382-3d72-4fd7-b98a-e6ff78b0a1a9';
UPDATE in_game_store SET player_id = 'c7ed44d6-7c81-4f90-8e02-d4f25e13a2b1', purchase_date = '2022-10-12 15:30:00' WHERE item_name = 'Legendary Sword';
UPDATE purchases SET item_price = 25.99, item_name = 'New Item' WHERE purchase_id = 123
UPDATE inventory SET currency_amount = currency_amount + 50.00, items_owned = array_append(items_owned, 'New Item') WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE purchases SET item_name = 'Diamond Sword', item_price = 20.99 WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE inventory SET currency_amount = 500.00, items_owned = ARRAY['Sword', 'Shield'] WHERE player_id = 2001;
UPDATE in_game_purchases SET price = 15.99 WHERE purchase_id = '6a17b899-7c59-4d8b-ba1d-8bcd46320aae';
UPDATE virtual_currencies SET exchange_rate = 0.75,currency_name = 'Coins' WHERE currency_id = 'b8732f06-b1c4-49a7-8a33-9b9d1d1c60e9';
UPDATE in_game_purchases SET price = 15.99, item_name = 'Sword', purchase_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE purchase_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_inventory SET item_quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = '456e7890-e12a-45b6-a789-426614174000' AND item_id = 'abcf1234-d567-ef89-1234-567890abcdef';
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE purchase_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE inventory_id = 2;
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE item_id = 101 AND purchase_id = 10;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE player_id = 5 AND item_id = 201;
UPDATE Purchase SET amount = 25.99 WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE VirtualCurrency SET exchange_rate = 1.5 WHERE currency_name = 'Coins';
UPDATE Purchase SET amount = amount + 10 WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE PlayerProfile SET player_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 2001;
